title: Towards a Faithful Quantumness Certification Functional for One-Dimensional Continuous-Variable Systems
summary: If the phase space-based Sudarshan-Glauber distribution, $P_ρ$, has negative values the quantum state, $ρ$, it describes is nonclassical. Due to $P$'s singular behavior this simple criterion is impractical to use. Recent work [Bohmann and Agudelo, Phys. Rev.
